titleStmt.title: The sovereigns prerogative and the subjects priviledge discussed betwixt courtiers and patriots in Parliament, the third and fourth yeares of the reign of King Charles : together with the grand mysteries of state then in agitation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.

notesStmt.note: The preface signed: T.F. [i.e., Thomas Fuller].
"A reissue of Ephemeris parliamentaria, with a new title"--BM, v. 63, col. 757.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
